attributes.action: Price lock re- sale event tickets to original price or less.
attributes.additional_details: Hear a bill in parliament mandating that event tickets cannot be re- sold for more than the original price.
attributes.background: To stop people buying up event tickets to re sell only for profit. Reduce the use of bots and profiteering from genuine fans.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: "Ban all ticket touting and reselling of tickets for higher prices" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734049
